attributes.action: Compel Care Home Inspectorates to include details of complaints upheld and outcomes of investigations into such complaints against care homes in annual inspection reports.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present prospective care home service users, and their families, have no access to previous complaints against individual care homes; and are sometimes unaware of serious problems with the management of the homes. Sometimes relatives place their Mother/Father in homes where they are being put at risk, despite Councils themselves witholding placements because of abuse, etc.
